title: 3.6: Broken links in security-oidc-bearer-token-authentication-tutorial
body:
**Describe the bug**

The `security-oidc-bearer-token-authentication-tutorial` guide contains a couple of broken links to other Quarkus guides.
For example, in the [Run the application in dev mode](https://quarkus.io/guides/security-oidc-bearer-token-authentication-tutorial#keycloak-dev-mode) there are links to `Dev Services for Keycloak` and `Dev UI` pages whose links are:

https://quarkus.io/guides/%7Bquarkusio-guides%7D/security-openid-connect-dev-services
https://quarkus.io/guides/%7Burl-quarkusio-guides%7Ddev-ui

The issue seems to be the usage of the `{quarkusio-guides}` and `{url-quarkusio-guides}` variables to create the links.

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/blob/11827a0dab55be25ce5fd54f5fd9513dd44f319c/_guides/security-oidc-bearer-token-authentication-tutorial.adoc?plain=1#L265-L266

**Which pages**

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/blob/develop/_guides/security-oidc-bearer-token-authentication-tutorial.adoc

https://quarkus.io/guides/security-oidc-bearer-token-authentication-tutorial
